filteredArticles.headline: University's retrieval policy draws mixed reactions from on-campus residents
filteredArticles.abstract: Some students, having been unable to retrieve belongings from their dorms for months, are frustrated by Penn Residential Services’ recently announced procedures for letting students retrieve, store, or ship their items.

dominantMedia.title: Move Out Penn Residential Services.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Students who have not moved out from the College Houses may return to campus between June 4 and June 13 to retrieve their belongings, or have their items packed and stored at no cost.

filteredArticles.headline: In new summer video series, SAS professors lecture on music, philosophy, and physics
filteredArticles.abstract: The Big Ideas for Strange Times series launched on May 15, and includes five-minute lectures on "ideas that transcend the immediate crisis of the pandemic." One video lecture will be broadcasted each week throughout the summer.

dominantMedia.title: Big Ideas for Strange Times.jpg
dominantMedia.content: Big Ideas for Strange Times lectures are short enough to be accessible to students, yet still pique interest in the various topics.
